sentences.sContent: The 260-bed hostel on Second Street, just two blocks from the beach, had come highly recommended by an Angeleno I’d met on a recent trip to the Caribbean.
sentences.sContent_eng: The 260-bed hostel on Second Street, just two blocks from the beach, had come highly recommended by an Angeleno I’d met on a recent trip to the Caribbean.
sentences.sCn: 这家有260张床位的招待所离海滩只有两个街区，是我在最近一次去加勒比海的旅途上遇见的一个洛杉矶人极力推荐的。

synos.tran: 旅社，招待所（尤指青年旅社）

phrases.pCn: 青年招待所；青年（学生）宿舍

words.tran: 招待周到地；亲切地；善于款待地

remMethod.val: host(主人) + el → 房间临时的主人 → 招待所； 学生宿舍

trans.tranOther: a place where people can stay and eat fairly cheaply
